patterns: Hello
Hi
Holla
responses: Hello, Hi
Hey!

patterns: Assalamualaikum
Assalam
Salam
responses: Waalaikumsalam brother/sister.
Wasalam. Hope you doing well.

patterns: Goodbye
See you again!
Hope we meet again.
Bye
responses: Farewell, Bye, see you again!
See you later soon!

patterns: Thank you
Thank you very much
Thanks
responses: You are welcome.

patterns: Do you know Mahallah Zubair phone number?

Mahallah Zubair phone no?
responses: Mahallah Zubair office phone number is 03-6421 5968/5695/5967

Mahallah Zubair whatsapp number?

Mahallah Zubair website?

patterns: May I know Mahallah Zubair address?
What address can I use to send parcel to Zubair?
Mahallah Zubair address?
responses: Any letters or parcels can be send to Mahallah Zubair Al-Awwam, International Islamic University Malaysia, 53100 Jalan Gombak, Kuala Lumpur

patterns: May I know Mahallah Zubair email address?
Where can I forward my enquiries regarding Mahallah Zubair?
Mahallah Zubair email address?
responses: Any questions or enqueries can be forwarded to mahallahzubairalawwam@gmail.com
